main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, saucer-shaped object with glowing windows and dark contrast that disappeared instantly over Sylvania, Ohio in 1960.
interesting points: The witness stated that they were told they would see the object through mental telepathy, and that they observed the path of the object prior to the visual sighting.
The object was described as saucer-like, with bright windows and dark contrast, and it disappeared instantly.
The Air Force concluded the sighting was a balloon, but the witness report contained contradictory statements.
The witness estimated the object was 20-30 feet in diameter and round, silvery-white or translucent in color.
sighted object: a bright, saucer-shaped object with glowing windows
